Other Information.Test Conditions: Presence of high salt (0.5 M NaCl) and protein (5 mg/mL BSA)
Other Information.Additional Info: Excluded due to large size; FeOOH@ZIF-8 showed selectivity for small metabolites over proteins

Sieving Mechanism: Size-exclusion effect for selective detection of metabolites

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enhanced ionization efficiency, signal-to-noise ratio, and sensitivity for small metabolites

Other Information.Additional Info: FeOOH@ZIF-8 composites displayed enhanced ionization efficiency and size-exclusion effect, enabling fast, sensitive, and selective LDI MS analysis of small metabolites in serum without pretreatment.
